docna.cdata!:
Swaziland - Rural Development Project : Loan
            1375 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Swaziland - Rural Development
            Project : Loan 1375 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project will provide assistance to
            10 Rural Development Areas, two of which will be developed
            intensively. The project includes components for (a)
            strengthening and developing extension services and
            infrastructure, (b) livestock development, (c) land
            development and construction works, (d) incremental
            agricultural inputs, (e) credit services, (f) access and
            feeder roads, (g) social infrastructure development, (h)
            central management services, and (i) studies and training.
